title: NEX Mall kidzPLAY @ Skygarden Pirate Adventure
blurb: Seafaring pirate adventure at rooftop kidzPLAY @ Skygarden.
description: The NEX Mall playground, also known as kidzPLAY @ Skygarden, offers a pirate ship adventure theme with both wet and dry play areas. The water playground features a pirate ship structure with multiple levels, a sea monster with climbing holds and a slide, sprays, and fountains. The dry playground includes a red ship with slides and climbing apparatus, as well as low swings. There is also a changing room available for kids who wish to head to the water playground. The playground is open from 11 am to 7 pm and is located at Level 4R.
full_address: It is located at Level 4R, 23 Serangoon Central Singapore 556083

title: NEX: Playground, Mall, Water & Kidzplay, SkyGarden
blurb: Explore NEX's family-friendly attractions and activities.
description: NEX offers a variety of family-friendly attractions, including a playground, a mall with various retail outlets, Water Kidzplay, and the SkyGarden. These spaces provide opportunities for kids to play and explore in a safe and engaging environment. The mall also hosts events and activities throughout the year, making it a destination for families looking for entertainment and shopping options. NEX caters to families with young children, offering a mix of recreational and retail experiences. The mall's design and amenities are geared towards creating a comfortable and enjoyable experience for families visiting the location. NEX is a great place for families to spend quality time together.

title: Temasek Foundation × SSO Concerts for Children
blurb: Enjoy a Halloween Spooktacular concert for children!
description: This Halloween Spooktacular concert is perfect for families and children who love music and spooky fun. The concert features a range of classical pieces with a Halloween theme, performed by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra. Children can dress up in their favorite costumes and enjoy the show. The concert is designed to be engaging and entertaining for young audiences, with interactive elements and fun surprises. It's a great way to introduce children to classical music in a fun and accessible way. The venue is family-friendly and offers a comfortable and enjoyable experience for all attendees.
full_address: SPOT Robot Coding Workshop At Hyundai Motor Group Innovation Centre Singapore

title: NEX Rooftop Playground: Wet & Dry Play Paradise
blurb: Free rooftop playground with wet and dry play areas.
description: The NEX rooftop playground offers separate play areas with both wet and dry play opportunities for children. The playground has a sea-faring theme. It is a great place for kids to have fun and parents to relax. The playground is designed to be safe and engaging for children of all ages. The wet play area features water jets and sprinklers, while the dry play area has slides, swings, and climbing structures. The playground is open daily and is free to access. It is a popular spot for families to spend time together.
full_address: It is located at Level 4R, 23 Serangoon Central Singapore 556083.
